cast.name: Stevie Ray Vaughan Stevie Ray Vaughan

this_title: Rise of a Texas Bluesman: Stevie Ray Vaughan 1954-1983
introduction: This film reveals and dissects the formative years of Stevie Ray Vaughan's career - his influences and recordings - and traces the history of Texas blues itself, identifying Vaughan's place within this larger tradition. Featuring rare archive footage, exclusive interviews and a host of other features which all at once provide the finest document on the celebrated guitarist yet to emerge.
chinese_title: Rise of a Texas Bluesman: Stevie Ray Vaughan 1954-1983
